Calculation

Class HammingCalculation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Calculation.HammingCalculation

    public class HammingCalculation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    Author:
    LITAF HammingCalculation initiate the wanted threshold Calculate mathid: return true if the fragments passes the predetermined threshold otherwise - return false
